attributes.action: stop inappropriate material before the watershed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned about the amount of swearing and sexual scenes shown before 9.00pm, the watershed.  I have voiced my concerns to the appropriate television companies and OFCOM.  They quite rightly say that parents should monitor what their children watch. Which we do after 9.00pm but I do not feel this should be needed before 9.00 and this applies to older children.
